gym_ghost_040_receptionist_01:
Are you ready to challenge Gym Leader Ryme,
the MC of RIP?
gym_ghost_040_receptionist_02:
Very well. Allow me to show you to the
battle court.
gym_ghost_040_receptionist_03:
Of course. Please feel free to come speak to me
whenever you’re ready.
gym_ghost_040_receptionist_nobattle:
Oh! You will need at least two Pokémon fit for
battle in order to challenge Ryme!
gym_ghost_040_system_01:
It sounds like there might be a rap battle going
on over at the stage.
gym_ghost_040_man_01:
É meu dia, é minha hora!
Sai da frente e não me amola!
gym_ghost_040_man_02:
Escute, Ryme—seu reino acaba aqui!
Meu lance aqui é profissional!
gym_ghost_040_ghost_01:
Seu lance? Bem isso eu vou ver.
Farei sua rima aqui desaparecer![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_02:
Olha lá—se pensa que tá na jogada?
Inocente, tenho "rima" até no nome!\c
Sou espírito poderoso, e sua vitória
irei tomar, quando a multidão olhar\r
a droga de batalha que vai mostrar![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_03:
Acabar com meu reinado? Vá tentando, garoto.
Livro de rima, não tem na academia![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_man_03:
Acabou — você venceu!  Minhas rimas acabaram!
 Mas voltarei — talvez depois do meu próximo turno!
gym_ghost_040_ghost_04:
Desistiu! Onde está indo? Sua rima morreu?!\c
“Depois do meu próximo turno”?  A sério?  Isso
não é Showzinho diurno![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_05: Isso acabou rápido demais.  Fica chato usar a coroa se ninguém lutar mais.[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_07: Ei, minha abertura voltou!  Você aqui para uma batalha de rap ou uma batalha de ginásio?[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_select_01: Estou para uma batalha de Ginásio!
gym_ghost_040_select_02: Estou aqui para uma batalha de rap!
gym_ghost_040_ghost_09:
Hah! You got jokes! We both know why you’re
REALLY here.[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_10: You were captivated by that show I put on, huh?[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_11:
I rap what’s in my soul, baby. Weavin’ words into
a symphony of poetry.[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_12:
Don’t try it with me—you won’t last one round.
I’m like Sableye: my Mean Look’ll lock you down!\c
Like that! You feel me?[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_13:
Heh. Well, let’s get to it—you’re a Pokémon
Trainer. So battle me, and show me who you are![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_14:
My music’s not all that tops the charts—my skills
with Ghost types are the best around![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_15:
Lest you forget it, the name is Ryme, and I’m
known as the MC of RIP![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_16: Dead or alive, let’s make this a vibe![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_18:
You’ve got spirit, kid. You earned my Gym
Badge, all right![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_19: And how about a VIP pass for my next show, too?[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_badge:
With [num1:1] Gym Badge[s:n1], it’ll be easier to catch
Pokémon of up to Lv. [num2:2], and they’ll listen to\r
what you have to say, too![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_badge_all:
With 8 Gym Badges, you’ll be able to catch
Pokémon of any level, and they’ll be sure to\r
listen to what you have to say, too![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_waza:
I’m feelin’ so good that I think I’m also gonna let
you have this![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_20:
Too bad it’s over! Make your way back to my
stage sometime. Maybe next time, we rap battle\r
instead. Who knows?[npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_21:
I’m sure you’ve got some scary-good adventures
ahead. I’ll be cheerin’ for ya! Later![npcn:1B]
gym_ghost_040_receptionist_04:
Congratulations! You’re now certified by the
Montenevera Gym!
